snippet: Al Qaeda’s leader, Ayman al-Zawahri, has released a new video in which he encourages Somali militants to fight on despite the challenges.
lead_paragraph: Al Qaeda’s leader, Ayman al-Zawahri, has released a new video in which he encourages Somali militants to fight on despite the challenges.

headline.main: Somalia: Al Qaeda’s Leader Encourages Militants
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Al Qaeda’s Leader Encourages Militants
